text: You are creating a deep neural network classification model using a dataset with categorical input values. Certain columns have a cardinality greater than 10,000 unique values. How should you encode these categorical values as input into the model?

choices.text: Convert each categorical value into an integer value.
Convert the categorical string data to one-hot hash buckets.
Map the categorical variables into a vector of boolean values.
Convert each categorical value into a run-length encoded string.
